arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
